line.originaltext: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast
2 cups warm water (110 degrees to 115 degrees), divided
1/3 cup sugar
2 tablespoons vegetable oil
1 tablespoon salt
1/2 cup rye or whole wheat flour
5 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water.
In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water.
line.annotation: separate(ing113, ing119, "1 1/2 cups of water", ing120, "1/2 cup of water", "")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water.
line.annotation: combine({ing112, ing120}, ing121, "mix", "dissolve yeast in water")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water.
Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth.
line.annotation: separate(ing118, ing122, "3 cups flour", ing123, "2 1/2 cups flour", "")

line.originaltext: Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing114, ing115, ing116, ing117, ing119, ing121, ing122}, ing124, "mixture", "beat")

line.originaltext: Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough.
line.annotation: combine({ing123, ing124}, ing125, "dough", "add enough to make soft dough")

line.originaltext: Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
line.annotation: do(ing125, t26, ing126, "kneaded dough", "knead about 6-8 minutes")

line.originaltext: Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
line.annotation: leave(ing126,"let rise in a warm place for about 1 hour")

line.originaltext: Punch dough down.
Divide in half.
On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in.
On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in.
On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in.
line.annotation: do(ing128, , ing129, "flattened dough", "flatted each half to 1 inch thickness")

line.originaltext: Pierce each loaf several times with a fork.
Pierce each loaf several times with a fork.
line.annotation: cut(ing129, t29, ing130, "pierced dough", "pierce several times")

line.originaltext: Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes.
line.annotation: leave(ing130,"let rise in warm place 30 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing130, t30, ing131, "bread", "25-30 minutes or until golden brown")

line.originaltext: Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
